definition: to use as an excuse/on the pretext/excuse/pretext
to lend/to borrow/by means of/to take (an opportunity)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to remove sth that could be used as a pretext (idiom)

sentences.english: I don't look for alibis, I know everything.
sentences.chinese: 我不会找借口，我什么都知道。

sentences.english: The auspicious wish to work in the troupe, xiu-fang been feuding with reason.
sentences.chinese: 其祥希望在剧团工作，秀芳用借口推搪。

sentences.english: I asked her for the dictionary she borrowed from me, but she just fobbed me off with a stupid excuse.
sentences.chinese: 借我的字典还给我，她却胡乱找个借口把我搪塞过去。

sentences.english: DoEs tHiS LoVe, HoW LoOk lIkE, mAlE ChAsEs tHe fEmAlE PrOsTiTuTe's eXcUsE.
sentences.chinese: 这爱情，怎么像，男嫖女娼的借口。

sentences.english: He used his sore throat as a pretext for not going to school.
sentences.chinese: 他以喉痛作为不去学校的借口。

sentences.english: This is intolerable, but it isn't an indictment of growth itself.
sentences.chinese: 这是难以忍受的，但它不能作为控诉经济增长的借口。

sentences.english: West tile to worry about the act of parliament as an excuse to want to sleep together with her.
sentences.chinese: 西瓦以担心帕莱为借口，要与她睡在一起。

sentences.english: It is tempting to dismiss this trite formulation as a meaningless excuse for inaction.
sentences.chinese: 这种陈词滥调很容易被嗤为不作为的空洞借口。

sentences.english: That nurse should not plead inexperience in excuse of her mistake.
sentences.chinese: 那个护士不应该借口缺乏经验来为她的错误辩解。

sentences.english: Ms Fernández used the world financial crisis as an excuse for bringing forward the election.
sentences.chinese: 法娜赫姿女士利用世界金融危机作为借口参加竞选。

sentences.english: People often use several well-known excuses to procrastinate.
sentences.chinese: 人们经常用一些人所共知的借口去拖延时间。

sentences.english: There is no excuse for misidentifying a letter.
sentences.chinese: 没有借口弄错一个字母。

sentences.english: You can easily fake up an excuse to avoid going out with him.
sentences.chinese: 为避免同他一起外出，你可以很容易地编造一个借口。

sentences.english: She pretended illness as an excuse.
I do not use travel as an excuse for anything.
sentences.chinese: 我不会用出差作为任何事情的借口。

definition: to muddle through/to fob sb off/to beat around the bush/to dodge
to make excuses/to give an excuse (for not doing something)
